text: Magic Survivors is a casual survival game with roguelike role-play elements. Your task is to defend the wizard from hordes of monsters, collect diamonds to level up and improve your character's abilities (magic spells). After some time, you will face a battle with epic boss! Magic Survivors also has battle simulator elements with tons of enemies. Character abilities are divided into active and passive. Active abilities add useful attacks, and passive ones improve the wizard's skills. Each game session is unique in its own way, as it offers you epic magic spells to choose and upgrade. html:
1. Magic Survivors is a casual survival game with roguelike role-play elements.

    Your task is to defend the wizard from hordes of monsters, collect diamonds to level up and improve your character's abilities (magic spells). After some time, you will face a battle with epic boss! Magic Survivors also has battle simulator elements with tons of enemies.

    Character abilities are divided into active and passive. Active abilities add useful attacks, and passive ones improve the wizard's skills. Each game session is unique in its own way, as it offers you epic magic spells to choose and upgrade.

    Collect gold to buy epic characters (witcher, dark mage) and unique battle abilities.

    Download on Google Play
